instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the root HTML element or body. The entire app is Dark Mode by default.
2. FONTS: Import Barlow Condensed, Manrope, and JetBrains Mono in index.css immediately.
3. POS LAYOUT: Build the POS as a full-screen app (no sidebar navigation). Use a 'Exit' or 'Menu' button to return to Admin.
4. KDS LOGIC: KDS cards must change color based on 'time_elapsed'. < 5min: Green, 5-15min: Yellow, > 15min: Red.
5. INVENTORY: Use a dense table layout. Use JetBrains Mono for all stock numbers.
6. REVIEW RISK: Use the 'Traffic Light' colors defined in 'semantic' colors for the risk score dashboard.
7. COMPONENTS: Do not use default Shadcn borders. They are too light for this dark theme. Use 'border-white/10' or 'border-zinc-800'.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
